summary: "House of Cards" is an American TV show about politics. It's based on a book and a British TV series. The story follows Frank Underwood, a powerful politician, and his wife Claire as they do anything to get more power in Washington, D.C. The show is famous for showing how far people will go to get what they want. It was very popular and won many awards. However, the show ended early because of problems with the actor who played Frank.
title: House of Cards (American TV series)
